description:
Participating this award, you will be able to purchase DaoHuei collection, the first realistic cat NFT on Tangle Chain, with 50% discount.

And I'm going to donate "all" the income from badge owners to animal protection association in Taiwan!ğŸ¥°(Heart of Taiwan Animal Care)

By the way, the rest of the people which have no badge can still buy the DaoHuei collection, 50% of the income will donate to animal protection association too.
